com.paydiant.android.core.service

Class TransactionManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.service.TransactionManagerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransactionManagerService

    public class TransactionManagerService
extends Object
implements ITransactionManagerService
    Provides the implementations for transaction related operations defined in ITransactionManagerService.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

      Default constructor for Transaction Manager Service.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TransactionManagerService

        public TransactionManagerService()
        Default constructor for Transaction Manager Service. The constructor creates instance of the service and retrieves the single instance of the rest template from the RestTemplateContainer and assigns it to the restTemplate instance variable.

      • makeSplitPayment

        public PaymentTransaction makeSplitPayment(Payment payment)
        Description copied from interface: ITransactionManagerService
        Payment Transaction supporting split tenders. This method should be repeatedly called until the PaymentTransaction.isPartialPayment() is a completed payment.
        Specified by:
        makeSplitPayment in interface ITransactionManagerService
        Parameters:
        payment - Payment object containing the partial/full payment transaction information.
        Returns:
        PaymentTransaction object containing the details of the payment.
